Posts.EditableText:
Pizza is nothing great, but every now and then I could go for a slice or two. Take 'n' Bake place in the states, Papa Murphy's has a bomb ass stuffed pizza, chicken, bacon, peppers, green onions, hella cheese with white sauce. Pizza weighs over five pounds, one slice fills you up... that's grub.

There's a place in berkeley called Blondies Pizza, that place is single-handedly best pizza I've ever had though, like 2 bucks for a huge piece that is just heavenly.

I've heard New York pizza is good though too. Tell-tale stories of chicken strips on top of pizza and shit, that's word of mouth that sounds pretty good.
